10.title: Countdown to the Largest Bass

episode of.title: The Hunt for Monster Bass (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: MONSTER LARGEMOUTH BASS. Countdown through the season to reveal the true monster largemouth bass.

imdb.plot outline: Professional angler Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit largemouth bass across the country. Fishing through the dead of winter, thick fog, and searching for lakes forgotten in time, Ott uses all of his skill, focus, and determination to discover and possibly land these monster bass.
imdb.title: The Hunt for Monster Bass
akas: The Hunt for Monster Bass (United States)
plot: Professional angler Ott DeFoe hunts down double-digit largemouth bass across the country. Fishing through the dead of winter, thick fog, and searching for lakes forgotten in time, Ott uses all of his skill, focus, and determination to discover and possibly land these monster bass.
